Effect.en:
2 Effect Monsters
When this card is Special Summoned, and is now co-linked: You can Special Summon 1 "Codebreaker Zero Day" from your hand, Deck, or GY to any zone a Link Monster points to. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was destroyed by an opponent's card and sent there this turn: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Codebreaker Virus Swordsman" once per turn.
